data.system_settings: Windows 10 Home x64 (1803) - 1920 x 1080 Screen resolution
data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 26695
data.actual_result: UI size is too big and some buttons aren't on it due to its size.
data.expected_result: The UI should fit and all buttons should be visible.
data.short_description: Create a new server too big with 200% zoom
data.steps_to_repro: - Set windows text size to 125% (Settings > System) - Set Discord zoom to 200% - Click the + at the bottom of the server list - Click the "Create new server" button
